quote: There is a history of gay people pretending to be straight. I want to balance the sides. I'm a straight person pretending to be gay. I've had a lot of people to imitate. It's easy when you're British; we're camp by nature, anyway.

When daddy goes to work, it's daddy going to work, not Rob going to work. I feel like there's a purpose to everything.
